properties.areaDesc: Pulaski, GA; Laurens, GA; Dodge, GA; Twiggs, GA; Bleckley, GA; Houston, GA; Wilkinson, GA
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 7:54PM EST until January 11 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northwestern Laurens County in central Georgia...
Southeastern Wilkinson County in central Georgia...
Northwestern Dodge County in central Georgia...
Northern Pulaski County in central Georgia...
Southeastern Twiggs County in central Georgia...
Bleckley County in central Georgia...
Southeastern Houston County in central Georgia...

* Until 845 PM EST.

* At 754 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Klondike, or
8 miles northwest of Hawkinsville, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Dublin, Cochran, Hawkinsville, East Dublin, Chester, Dexter,
Dudley, Cadwell, Rentz, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Dubois,
Browndale, Tarversville, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Roddy,
Nicklesville and Baileys Park.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central
Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until midnight EST
for central Georgia.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has
passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free
at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
